title: The Line-Up and FBI In Peace And War
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr12021/CaseClosed741.mp3  This week on Case Closed, The Line-Up starts us off with The Jersey Parallel, their story from December 7, 1950. (29:30) The second story comes from The FBI In Peace And War. From them we'll hear The Club Date, their story from December 15, 1954. Download CaseClosed741
content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, The Line-Up starts us off with The Jersey Parallel, their story from December 7, 1950.

(29:30) The second story comes from The FBI In Peace And War. From them we’ll hear The Club Date, their story from December 15, 1954.

Download CaseClosed741
